about_the_game:
Crypt Cards original sound track by Nicholas Fisher.

1 - Main Theme (Fugue)
2 - Flutter Mouse
3 - Green Jelly
4 - Defeat
5 - Funeral March
6 - The River Styx
7 - Skull Shuffle
8 - Victory!
9 - Cerberus
10 - level Up!!
detailed_description:
Crypt Cards original sound track by Nicholas Fisher.

1 - Main Theme (Fugue)
2 - Flutter Mouse
3 - Green Jelly
4 - Defeat
5 - Funeral March
6 - The River Styx
7 - Skull Shuffle
8 - Victory!
9 - Cerberus
10 - level Up!!

linux_requirements.minimum:

  • Processor: Dual Core
  • Memory: 500 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Any

  • OS: Any
  • Processor: Dual Core
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM

  • Sound Card: Stereo
